content: Medicine Ingredients are one of the most plentiful resources in Black Myth: Wukong. The game is filled with them across the different areas and chapters They are vital for crafting new Consumable Items or stockpiling them to give you an edge in boss battles and tough fights.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Medicine_Ingredients.md', within the main section titled 'Medicine Ingredients'.
The content is as follows:
Medicine Ingredients are one of the most plentiful resources in Black Myth: Wukong. The game is filled with them across the different areas and chapters They are vital for crafting new Consumable Items or stockpiling them to give you an edge in boss battles and tough fights.
